mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product_list A INNER JOIN product_detail B ON A.iboard = B.iboard WHERE A.iboard = ${iboard}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board_list (icategory, iuser, title, ctnt) VALUES (${icategory}, ${iuser}, #{title}, #{ctnt})
mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard, A.title, B.nm AS writerNm FROM t_board_list A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.icategory = ${icategory} ORDER BY iboard DESC
